description:
Welcome to the ultimate proving ground for fearless cyclists.

This is a world where skill is everything, and your next ride is always more demanding than the last. Carve your path down treacherous mountainsides, launch off impossibly huge ramps, and chain together insane trick combinations to dominate the leaderboards. Every jump, every whip, and every landing is a test of precision.

Ride different weather conditions across a variety of stunning, handcrafted environments that are as beautiful as they are dangerous. To unlock new challenges and progress, you'll need more than just speed, you'll need style. Prove you have the technique to master every course.

Your career is in your hands. Earn your stripes, and then head to the shop to customize your look with fresh outfits and gear. Stand out from the crowd and define your own style.

This is a pure, single-player mountain biking experience, built for those who push the limits.

There are no shortcuts to the top.

Your ride starts now.
